sourcesContent:
import { Container } from '../../style'; const LearningWithSpecialNeeds = () => { return (

In our effort to provide education to everyone, we at Tagpros place a strong emphasis on diversity. Having said that, we also want our platform to be accessible to learners with special needs. Here are our suggestions for you on how to create a community that can support children with special needs:

 

Teachers

  • List on your profile any experience or credentials with special education.
  • You can create a class that specifically caters to learners with special needs

 

Parents

  • If your children have special needs and you want to enroll them in a class, message the teacher if he/she can accommodate adding your children to the class.
  • You can contact us regarding the needs of your children at customercare@tagpros.us . We will be happy to help you find classes and options that will help your children navigate our platform.
); }; export default LearningWithSpecialNeeds;
